column1: The Battle of Eglarest was one of the first
column3: battle fought during the War of Wrath.

column1: At the head of the Army of the West was Ingwion son of IngwÃ« leading the Vanyar host. At Eglarest Ingwion and his host made a landing and found a swarm of Orcs around it. Thereafter he and his host drove away the Orcs from the shores of the Belegaer. Nothing more is said of the battle in detail.
